main event: Observers sighted a large, glowing red object in Medway, Ohio, about 50-60 ft in diameter, which hovered silently before taking off at a high speed.
interesting points: The object had an array of red and white lights around its edges., The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes., Mr. Forster and his wife were able to clearly observe the object while stopped in their car., The object was described as totally silent during the observation., The military request for additional information from the witnesses indicates ongoing interest in the phenomenon.
sighted object: large lighted object in the sky
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Steven J. Forster, ages not specified, returning home from visiting friends.
